name: Grilled Chicken Adobo
author: HEART-OF-MIDLOTHIAN
summary: This is a very tasty and easy-to-make Filipino chicken dish made with soy sauce, garlic, and vinegar. I can just as easily double or triple the chicken in this recipe to serve guests at a party. Serve over rice with just a little of the sauce (not too much).
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil grate
In a large pot, mix soy sauce, water, vinegar, honey, garlic, bay leaves, and pepper
Bring the mixture to a boil, and place the chicken into the pot
Reduce heat, cover, and cook 35 to 40 minutes
Remove chicken, drain on paper towels, and set aside
Return the mixture to a boil, and cook until reduced to about 1 1/2 cups
Place chicken on the prepared grill, about 5 minutes on each side, until browned and crisp
Serve with the remaining soy sauce mixture
